wikipedia_page.main: Darren McGeouch, (born 28 February 1990) is a Scottish footballer who plays as a midfielder.

response: A few unattached players took part in the first day of pre-season training, including Archie Campbell, Peter MacDonald and Darren McGeouch (who previously played for the club). Gavin Skelton was also spoken to regarding a possible move to Cappielow, and came into the training ground for a trial. Skelton signed for English non-league side Barrow after being offered a bumper contract; a major coup for the Bluebirds.
Three more trialists signed up on one-year deals, Darren McGeouch, Peter MacDonald and Archie Campbell.
|Andy Graham    David O'Brien   Archie Campbell   Darren McGeouch   Paul Di Giacomo
|Andy Graham   Ross Forsyth   Fouad Bachirou   Simon Mensing   Darren McGeouch   Derek Young

Paul Di Giacomo, Colin Stewart, Stuart McCaffrey, Darren McGeouch, Ross Forsyth, Grant Evans, Marc Smyth, Andy Jackson, Matthew McGinley and Iain Flannigan left the club after their contracts expired. Mark McLaughlin was the first to be brought in to begin the rebuilding process.
